jodd.mail

Class ReceiveMailSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.mail.ReceiveMailSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ReceiveMailSession
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates Email receiving session. Prepares and receives Emails. Some methods do not work on POP3 servers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  jodd.mail.MailSession.Defaults

      • receiveEmail

        public ReceivedEmail[] receiveEmail()
        Receives all emails. Messages are not modified. However, servers may set SEEN flag anyway, so we force messages to remain unseen.
        Returns:
        array of ReceivedEmails.

      • receiveEmail

        public ReceivedEmail[] receiveEmail(EmailFilter filter)
        Receives all emails that matches given EmailFilter. Messages are not modified. However, servers may set SEEN flag anyway, so we force messages to remain unseen.
        Parameters:
        filter - EmailFilter
        Returns:
        array of ReceivedEmails.

      • receiveEmailAndMarkSeen

        public ReceivedEmail[] receiveEmailAndMarkSeen()
        Receives all emails and mark all messages as 'seen' (ie 'read').
        Returns:
        array of ReceivedEmails.
        See Also:
        receiveEmailAndMarkSeen(EmailFilter)

      • receiveEmailAndMarkSeen

        public ReceivedEmail[] receiveEmailAndMarkSeen(EmailFilter filter)
        Receives all emails that matches given EmailFilter and mark them as 'seen' (ie 'read').
        Parameters:
        filter - EmailFilter
        Returns:
        array of ReceivedEmails.

      • receiveEmailAndDelete

        public ReceivedEmail[] receiveEmailAndDelete()
        Receives all emails and mark all messages as 'seen' and 'deleted'.
        Returns:
        array of ReceivedEmails.
